title: Overqwil

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Poison Sting: Sting a player, poisoning them. They'll be dealt a Basic attack at the end of the next night unless healed. (âˆž uses, one night cooldown)
- Barb Barrage: Poison all players that visit any Pokemember besides you tonight. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Pokemembers are immune to being affected by your abilities or attributes.

fields.name: Pokemon Ability:
fields.value: - Poison Point: If killed at night, poison everyone that visited you, including Astral visitors. If you're hanged, poison two non-Pokemon who voted you. This poison deals an Overqwil attack and cannot be healed.

desc:
Post 3075
*Now it's gonna do a lot more than poke ya.*
